Event.name: Medical_interaction_scenario
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Patient</fen> interacts with one or more <fen>Medic</fen>s (doctors, nurses, and/or EMTs with a responsibility for the <fen>Patient</fen>'s health) so that the <fen>Medic</fen>s can determine the health status of the <fen>Patient</fen> and maintain or restore the <fen>Patient</fen>'s health as necessary. <ex></ex> Usually, the <fen>Patient</fen> has an <fen>Affliction</fen>, a medical problem that motivates or necessitates their coming into the care of a <fen>Medic</fen>. At a minimum, the <fen>Patient</fen> has a single interaction with a <fen>Medic</fen>, but usually the <fen>Patient</fen> has a relationship with the <fen>Medic</fen> or group of medical professionals who either have responsibility for helping them with their specific <fen>Affliction</fen> or for their health in general. Medical interactions normally take place at a <fen>Medical_center</fen> (a hospital or doctor's office), but in cases where the <fen>Patient</fen> suffers a sudden catastrophic <fen>Affliction</fen>, the <fen>Patient</fen> may be taken into the care of EMTs, who act as their <fen>Medic</fen> until reaching a medical center. <ex></ex> In some cases, the <fen>Body_system</fen> that has a problem is mentioned in place of the <fen>Affliction</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Medic">Her</fex> three <fex name="Body_system">cardiac</fex> <fex name="Patient"><t>patients</t></fex> take up all her time.</ex> <ex><fex name="Medic">Our doctors</fex> <m>provide</m> the best <t>healthcare</t> on the planet.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Medic
Arg.definition: <def-root>The medical professional who has responsibility for the care of the <fen>Patient</fen> </def-root>

Arg.name: Affliction
Arg.definition: <def-root>The particular disorder that the <fen>Patient</fen> is suffering from and the the <fen>Medic</fen> treats.</def-root>

Arg.name: Body_system
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The part of the <fen>Patient</fen>'s body that is being treated.
<ex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Medical_center
Arg.definition: <def-root>The place visited by the <fen>Patient</fen> and where the <fen>Medic</fen> works.</def-root>

Arg.name: Patient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who is under the care of a <fen>Medic</fen> or other form of medical professional.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: patient.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person under the care of a medical professional.

lexUnit.name: doctor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person licensed to provide the widest range of treatment and most definitive medical advice.

lexUnit.name: nurse.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person licensed for administering limited forms of medical treatment and advice.

lexUnit.name: surgeon.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a physician who specializes in physically intervening with the inside of a patient's body.

lexUnit.name: medical care.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: supervision by a medical professional
